Key Match Events: Zach Edey debuted for the Memphis Grizzlies against the Utah Jazz.
Edey scored his first two points off a putback following a Ja Morant miss.
Despite Edey's limited contribution, the Grizzlies led 61-50 at halftime.
Edey finished with five points and five rebounds after fouling out with 9:15 remaining in the final period.
The Memphis Grizzlies won the game 126-124 over the Utah Jazz.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Taylor Jenkins preferred Santi Aldama over Zach Edey for long stretches.
Aldama finished the game with 27 points on 10-for-16 shooting, including 5-for-10 from deep.
